DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate single-dose pharmacokinetics GS-9674 adult impair hepatic function relative match , healthy control normal hepatic function .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics GS-9674 Adults With Normal Impaired Hepatic Function
DOC.criteria: Key Cohort 1 : Individuals mildly impair normal hepatic function . Individuals mild hepatic impairment must score 56 CPT Classification Screening without evidence worsen clinical and/or laboratory sign hepatic impairment within 2 month prior within screen period . Cohort 2 : Individuals moderately impair normal hepatic function . Individuals moderate hepatic impairment must score 79 CPT Classification Screening without evidence worsen clinical and/or laboratory sign hepatic impairment within 2 month prior within screen period . Cohort 3 : Individuals severely impair normal hepatic function . Individuals severe hepatic impairment must score 1015 CPT Classification Screening without evidence worsen clinical and/or laboratory sign hepatic impairment within 2 month prior within screen period . Note : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
